title: all Cultures games.iso
description:
English

Hi, iam uploading all the Cultures games for PC becuse they are relly nice games :)




how to install Cultures 1

go to the extra folder in the iso file
and open the Cultures.exe with winrar
then extract it whereever you want
then in the folder you have extracted it
press the "setupreg"
then play the game :D


how to install Cultures 2


go to the extra folder in the isofile
then open the Cultures 2.exe and install it
then go to the folder you have installed it
and press the setup.exe and when its done
play the game :D


how to install Cultures 3

mount the iso file with deamon tools or magic iso, or with PowerISO
install it,, then play the game with the iso file mounted or burn it with
with a program with that can burn iso files,, but you will need the cd in the
cd rom drive or the isofile mounted evrytime you are going to play Cultures 3
there are maybe a nocd crack on gamecopyworld, but this works,,

note: if the game is crashing like it did for me, when starting the game,,
then do this trick, go in to the DataX folder then Fmv folder and change the name of the Eng
folder to Eng1 or whatever or remove it,, then start the game again and now it works :D

if you have eny problems with this then just contact me on my E-mail <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="4135333424262837282b2e01292e352c20282d6f222e2c">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">
